name: Inu & Neko: The Kiretsu menace
description:
Japan, dark alley, year 2143.

Very old rival gangs, cats and dogs fight for control of the street. Our two heroes Inu and Neko know only that. Until the arrival of the lizards. They managed to defeat the old gangs and take control.
However our friends don't give up, they decide to join forces to defeat the lizards.
Will the speed of Neko and the power of Inu be enough to counter the lizards and take back what belongs to them?


Controls:

This is a 2 players game.

- The moves :
   - Player 1 :
      - Z : move forward
      - Q: left
      - D: right
      - S: back
      - A: attack
      - F: sprint
   - Player 2 :
      - O : advance
      - K: left
      - M: right
      - L: back
      - I: attack
      - J: sprint

Everything is home made from scratch. Have fun playing !

Made by JAFFUER Pierre, CLAIN Miguel, LE LIDEC Tristan, ROCOCO Anthony et PITREBOTH Jérémy.
